# tokenCreationDate

**Type**

The field of an external purchase token that contains the UNIX date, in milliseconds, when the system created the token.

## Declaration

```swift
timestamp tokenCreationDate
```

## Discussion

This field represents the date when the system created the [doc://com.apple.appstoreservernotifications/documentation/AppStoreServerNotifications/externalPurchaseToken].

## External purchase token fields

- **externalPurchaseId**: The field of an external purchase token that uniquely identifies the token.
- **tokenExpirationDate**: The field of a custom link token that contains the UNIX date, in milliseconds, when the token expires.
- **tokenType**: The type of an external purchase custom link token.
